bundle.shortDescription: A cross-platform desktop application for ProntoKey and Stream Deck.
bundle.longDescription: OpenDeck is a desktop application that provides Stream Deck-like functionality for ProntoKey and Elgato hardware, implementing the Stream Deck SDK for cross-compatibility.

security.csp: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: asset: https://appstore.elgato.com; frame-src http://localhost:57118; connect-src https://appstore.elgato.com;
